titles.title: Kidney Health Connect Act of 2022
Kidney Health Connect Act of 2022
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to expand the ability of renal dialysis facilities to serve as originating sites for telehealth services under the Medicare program.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary:
Kidney Health Connect Act of 2022
This bill permanently allows Medicare beneficiaries to receive telehealth services at renal dialysis facilities.
